column1: Biopsy diagnostic of KS (fixed in formalin)

a: Total and direct bilirubin, creatinine, SGOT [AST], SGPT [ALT].   b. Within 14 days before enrollment   c. Prior to chemotherapy.   d: Serum pregnancy test (women of childbearing potential).   e. A skin biopsy of an area of KS will be done prior to treatment start if one has not already been done in the past.   f: Prior to initiating treatment.
